text.div: "Alive and not functionally dependent at 90 days" is an outcome used in expressing what an Evidence is about.

title: Alive and not functionally dependent at 90 days

text.div: "Alteplase for Stroke" is an exposure concept with a detailed dosing instruction that may be used in expressing what an Evidence is about.

characteristic.description: IV alteplase 0.9 mg/kg (maximum 90 mg) as 10% of dose over 1 minute and 90% over 1 hour

text.div: "Dead or functionally dependent at 90 days" is an outcome used in expressing what an Evidence is about.

title: Dead or functionally dependent at 90 days

text.div: "Fatal Intracranial Hemorrhage Within Seven Days" is an outcome used in expressing what an Evidence is about.

title: Fatal Intracranial Hemorrhage Within Seven Days

note.text: Death must be due to intracranial hemorrhage

text.div: "mRS 0-2 at 90 days" is an outcome, defined by a CQL expression, used in expressing what an Evidence is about.

title: Modified Rankin Scale score 0-2 at 90 days after treatment

definitionExpression.expression: ["Observation": code in "75859-9|LOINC"] mRS where mRS.value between 0 and 2

text.div: "mRS 3-6 at 90 days" is an outcome, defined by a CQL expression, used in expressing what an Evidence is about.

title: Modified Rankin Scale score 3-6 at 90 days after treatment

definitionExpression.expression: ["Observation": code in "75859-9|LOINC"] mRS where mRS.value between 3 and 6

text.div: "No alteplase" is an intended exposure concept that may be used in expressing what an Evidence is about.
Placebo is a specific exposure that may be used in expressing what an Evidence is about.
Stroke Thrombolysis Trialists’ Collaborators Group collection used for individual patient data meta-analysis

name: Stroke Thrombolysis Trialists’ 2014-2016 IPD-MA Cohort
title: Stroke Thrombolysis Trialists’ Collaborators Group collection used for individual patient data meta-analysis

relatedArtifact.label: Emberson 2014
relatedArtifact.display: Effect of treatment delay, age, and stroke severity on the effects of intravenous thrombolysis with alteplase for acute ischaemic stroke: a meta-analysis of individual patient data from randomised trials.
relatedArtifact.citation: Emberson J, Lees KR, Lyden P, Blackwell L, Albers G, Bluhmki E, et al;Stroke Thrombolysis Trialists' Collaborative Group. text.div: "Wardlaw 2014 Analysis 1.16.3 Evidence set" is a grouping of six Evidence results used in a meta-analysis.

note.text: Short names for Evidence sources are detailed in "References to studies included in this review"
